Injured on 8/20/2014 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Retired in 2018.
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Montreal in 2018...
Injured on 8/17/2018 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Montreal to Pittsburgh on 5/1/2019 (Going to PIT: SS R. Buckelew, 1B V. Ciles. Going to MON: 1B J. Votto)...
Injured on 7/12/2020 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...

Released by Baltimore on 3/2/1978...
